behaviour_trees.​ XPS_BT_typ_Condition

TypeDefinition

Authors

Crashdome

Description

A node for a Behaviour Tree that has an ProcessTick method which is called when Ticked

Parent

base. XPS_BT_typ_Leaf

Implements

XPS_BT_ifc_INode

Flags

none

Properties
Blackboard

base. XPS_BT_typ_Leaf. Blackboard

NodeType

base. XPS_BT_typ_Leaf. NodeType

Status

base. XPS_BT_typ_Leaf. Status

Protected
preTick

base. XPS_BT_typ_Leaf. preTick

processTick
_status = _self call ["processTick"]
Description

The code that executes during a Tick cycle of a Behaviour Tree and then returns a status.

Parameters
_status

String - "RUNNING", "SUCCESS", "FAILURE", or nil

Returns
_status

String - "RUNNING", "SUCCESS", "FAILURE", or nil

postTick

base. XPS_BT_typ_Leaf. postTick

Methods
Condition
_condition = _self call ["Condition"]
Description

The code that executes during a Tick cycle of a Behaviour Tree and then returns true/false.

Must be Overridden.

Returns
_condition

Boolean - True or False

Init

base. XPS_BT_typ_Leaf. Tick

Tick

base. XPS_BT_typ_Leaf. Tick
